text.ops: For the Hindu group, compute the ratio of Work participation to Literacy (40.40 over 65.10) to yield 0.6206.
text.ops2: For the Muslim group, compute the ratio of Work participation to Literacy (31.30 over 59.10) to yield 0.5296.

text.last: Bring forward the Hindu and Sikh ratio bars and compare them directly; the higher mark remains highlighted (Hindu at 0.6206).
